content: **knitted baubles in drops lima the piece is worked in the round bottom up with multi-coloured nordic pattern theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-172 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** circumference = 23 cm diameter = 7 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 0100 off white 50 g colour 0705 olive 50 g colour 0707 rust 50 g colour 2923 goldenrod 50 g colour 5610 deep taupe 50 g colour 9021 brick red 50 g colour 9022 blush 50 g colour 9023 maroon 50 g colour 9024 almond **accessories** wadding 1 bauble weighs approx 12 grams without wadding **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops crochet hook size 3 mm **knitting gauge ** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch and nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
